title: Mary Blair - Alice in Wonderland cover and text
content:
Can anyone help with the fonts used for this book featuring Mary Blair’s art?  
I’m particulary interested in the type used on the “Retold by”/”Pictures by” credit and the names “Jon Scieszka”/”Mary Blair”, in addition to the title. Also i think the book text in the second pic is Minion Pro - can anyone confirm?

Thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Untitled-1 copy.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091114124929/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1%20copy_1.jpg) | 620.98 KB |
| [Untitled-5 copy.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091114124929/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-5%20copy.jpg) | 565.81 KB |
author: Dash_X

comments.content:
“Retold by” etc. looks very similar to [Canterbury Old Style](http://web.archive.org/web/20091114124929/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/canterbury-old-style-rr/) althoughugh the R seems different. Maybe there is another variation of this typeface?

—- Tamas Ferencz —-

The names appear to be in Toronto Subway.

—- Tamas Ferencz —-
